job.title: Product Manager
job.description: Our mobile and internet app has completely the modernized the costly and timeconsuming century old automobile fuel supply chain in allowing the average person office park or any fleet of vehicles to conveniently refuel without having to move a musclebrbrWith nearly 90MM in funding and 180k daily revenue Our customers span from the automotive industry with Mercedes Benz to the consumer goods industry with Walmart With our massive market cap we are rapidly scaling to meet demand and looking to add a Staff Software Engineer to assist on Delivery Product strategy and roadmap based on users insights and provide new concepts and work flows to increase safety and efficiencybrbrWe are looking to add top of the industry talent to our team and with your experience it could be an ideal fit let me know if youre interested in a discussion about itbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrWork with design and engineering team to solve any and all problemsbrbrWork on product initiatives to improve customer experiencebrbrWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli A minimum of 4 years of experience working with b2b or Saas softwarelili Experience building a product from start to finishlili
